question: What is the name of the campaign launched by NITI Aayog to ensure well-being of senior citizens during COVID-19 pandemic?
explanation:
The Think tank of the country NITI Aayog in coloration with Mumbai-based Piramal Foundation has launched a campaign 'Surakshit Dada-Dadi & Nana-Nani Abhiyan'.
The campaign focusses on ensuring well-being of senior citizens during the COVID-19 pandemic. This is expected to cover as many as 29 lakh senior citizens in 25 aspirational districts named by NITI Aayog. This project is currently piloted in seven states and will create awareness about the health and lifestyle of elder people.
